metaData.label: Video Conference
metaData.criteriaDescription: Event ID equal Event ID AND ( Event Type equal ADM OR Event Type equal Physical OR Event Type equal 3rd Party OR Event Type equal ON24 OR Event Type equal Adobe OR Event Type equal TEAMS )

metaData.label: eCongress
metaData.criteriaDescription: Event ID equal Event ID AND Event Type equal Virtual Environment
